name: 3Punch
description:
"Welcome to Totally Not Evil Robots Inc! The safest place where nothing ever can go wrong! "

So let's just say things got south, the only one that made that alive without getting killed by evil robots (i wonder why they appeared) are some random intern and Roby the Robot, the only good robot. And well, they have to escape the facility...

3Punch is a platformer fighting game, where you need to dodge two attacks to do an attack (Third time's a charm right?). If you dodge for the third time, well you're back at the start (until you will dodge again 2 times). It was made for Game Off 2022 jam. It's my first game that I've made in my life and I hope you will enjoy it :3

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:

W/Up arrow - Jump

AD/Left and right arrow - move horizontally

S - Duck

E - Roll

Q - Dash

1,  2, 3 - Special ability

Left Click - Attack

Right Click - Parry

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:

Left Joystick - move horizontally

X (PS) / A (Xbox) / B (Nintendo) - Jump

Down Button - Duck

R1 - Roll

L1 - Dash

Square, Circle, Triangle (PS) / X,Y,B (Xbox) / Y, X, A (Nintendo) - Special Ability

L2 - Parry

R2 - Attack
